General.Name: Jiangsu Hengshun Vinegar-Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Hengshun Vinegar-Industry Co.,Ltd produces and sells vinegar products in China. The company offers a range of vinegar products, such as classic, craft brewing, organic, health vinegars, as well as cooking wine, soy sauce, sesame oil, pickles, drink rice wine, sauces, chicken essence MSG, snack foods, and seasoning products. Jiangsu Hengshun Vinegar-Industry Co.,Ltd was founded in 1840 and is headquartered in Zhenjiang, China.

1.Name: Mr. Chenyun  Wei
1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
